Matchcode: The transmission route was determined from the outbreak database 'Transmission'
description. The transmission route for VRE and MRSA was a lot more difficult to
ascertain. In general, if the database or the abstract made a strong statement
suggesting that they had confidence in the transmission route they were advocated
then I designated the transmission route along these lines.
